|stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, CN1 (3.3V TTL 57600 baud) |jtag = yes,, CN102 |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = SitecomXXXXXX |default_ch = |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = 8716502021505 |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = 6 blue, 1 amber |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A039000VER:1.00" is silkscreened on the board. :This device is using '''Jackcon''' capacitors. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=86305 Senao Ralink based routers and their ODM/OEM vendors] On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=88424 Sitecom wl-351] On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== ====JTAG Pinouts==== 8 Pin Header - 1 row 
?	        1
TRST        2
TCK	        3
TMS	        4
TDO	        5
TDI	        6
GND        7
VCC	        8

RTL8366RB
